title: Several spells of showers expected in parts of the island
byline: Several spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Northern, and North-western provinces and in Galle, Matara, Kandy, and Nuwara-Eliya districts, the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Former TNA MP Thanmanpillai Kanagasabai passes away
byline: Former Tamil National Alliance (TNA) Member of Parliament for the Batticaloa District, Thanmanpillai Kanagasabai, passed away yesterday (19) at the age of 86.

title: “I’ll fulfill my father’s wish and give 100% in Asia Cup” – Dunith Wellalage
byline: Sri Lankan all-rounder Dunith Wellalage has said that his father’s only wish was for him to become a good cricketer and represent the country, and he is determined to fulfill that dream.

title: Russian jets enter Estonia’s airspace in latest test for NATO
byline: Three Russian military jets violated NATO member Estonia’s airspace for 12 minutes on Friday in an “unprecedentedly brazen” incursion, its government said, the latest in a series of recent military actions by Russia that have rattled the alliance.

title: Winners of 10th Derana Film Awards 2025
byline: The 10th edition of Derana-Lux Film Awards got underway at the Nelum Pokuna Theatre in Colombo last night (Sept. 19) with the country’s top artistes adding glitz and glamour to the enchanting night.

title: Winners of 10th Derana Film Awards 2025
byline: The 10th edition of Derana-Lux Film Awards got underway at the Nelum Pokuna Theatre in Colombo last night (Sept. 19) with the country’s top artistes adding glitz and glamour to the enchanting night.

title: ‘Not here to replace people’: AI-generated minister addresses Albanian parliament
byline: Albania’s new AI-generated minister has addressed parliament for the first time, insisting it’s “not here to replace people, but to help them”.

title: School treasurer remanded over sexual abuse of special needs children
byline: Despite children with special needs deserving special care and protection, incidents of harassment against them continue to be reported across the country.

title: Over 1,400 kg ‘Ice’, 955 kg heroin, over 1,700 firearms seized by police in 2025
byline: According to Sri Lanka Police, raids carried out so far in 2025 have led to the recovery of significant quantities of narcotics and illegal firearms.

title: Rise in cases of online sexual abuse in Sri Lanka – Police
byline: Sri Lanka Police have reported that a total of 28 children and 118 women have fallen victim to online sexual abuse and exploitation so far in 2025.

title: Sri Lanka’s economy records mixed sectoral growth in Q2 2025
byline: According to the latest report released by the Department of Census and Statistics for the second quarter of 2025 (April 1 – June 30), Sri Lanka’s fisheries sector, vegetable cultivation, and rubber cultivation have recorded unstable performances, showing negative growth trends.

title: Trump adds $100,000 fee for skilled worker visa applicants
byline: US President Donald Trump has signed an executive order that will add a $100,000 (£74,000) annual fee for applicants to the H-1B visa programme for skilled foreign workers.

title: Border Control Computer System at BIA down for over 2 hours
byline: The “Border Control Computer System” of the Department of Immigration and Emigration at the arrival and departure terminals of the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) in Katunayake, which was down temporarily is now back in operation.

title: CEB trade union reps walk out of talks in protest
byline: It is reported that during the discussion held today (20) between the electricity trade unions and the heads of the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB), representatives of the trade unions had walked out in protest.

title: Former President Ranil to join UNP’s 79th anniversary celebration
byline: The 79th anniversary of the United National Party (UNP) will be celebrated today (20).

title: Trump administration proposes selling nearly $6 billion in weapons to Israel
byline: The Trump administration has told Congress it plans to sell nearly $6 billion in weapons to Israel, a fresh surge of support for the U.S. ally as it faces increasing isolation over its war in Gaza.

title: Kush and Hashish worth over Rs. 16.8M found in bathroom at BIA
byline: A large consignment of narcotics estimated to be worth approximately Rs. 16.84 million was discovered today (20) in the men’s bathroom of the arrivals terminal at Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), Katunayake.

title: Fire breaks out at building in Pettah
byline: A fire has reportedly broken out in a shop on the third floor of a building at 3rd Cross Street in Pettah.

title: Cyberattack disrupts European airports including Heathrow, Brussels
byline: A cyberattack on a provider of check-in and boarding systems has disrupted operations at several major European airports including London’s Heathrow, the continent’s busiest, causing flight delays and cancellations on Saturday.

title: “Showed motherly love to Sri Lankan Tamils”: Indian actor Vijay praises Prabhakaran
byline: In a move that is likely to stoke controversy, Tamizhaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK) chief Vijay on Saturday racked up the Sri Lankan Tamil issue and praised LTTE chief Velupillai Prabhakaran, who was the mastermind behind former Indian Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi’s assassination..

title: Thousands evacuated after WWII bomb discovered in Hong Kong
byline: Thousands of people were forced to evacuate their homes in Hong Kong after a large US-made bomb from the Second World War was discovered.
